CA.name: WARRIORS OROCHI® 3 Hyper
CA.description: Warriors Orochi 3 Hyper combines the much loved heroes of the Dynasty Warriors and Samurai Warriors series in a story that also features characters from Ninja Gaiden, Warriors: Legends of Troy, Bladestorm, Trinity: Souls of Zill O’ll, Dead or Alive and a new character made specifically for Warriors Orochi 3 Hyper! Years after the battle against Orochi, the Serpent King, the heroes of the Three Kingdoms and the Warring States struggle to seize control of the new universe they were thrown into when a new threat arises. A terrible and colossal monster, resembling a serpent with eight heads, casts its shadow across the land and defeats most of the brave warriors. The ones that survived, assisted by the mysterious Kaguya, travel back through time to save fallen warriors and forge new alliances, collect powerful weapons and build an army so they can have a chance to defeat the terrible Hydra.

MX.name: WARRIORS OROCHI® 3 Hyper
MX.description: ¡Warriors Orochi 3 Hyper combina los aclamados héroes de las series Dynasty Warriors y Samurai Warriors en una historia en la que también aparecen personajes de Ninja Gaiden, Warriors: Legends of Troy, Bladestorm, Trinity: Souls of Zill O'll, Dead or Alive y un nuevo personaje creado exclusivamente para Warriors Orochi 3 Hyper! Años después de la batalla contra Orochi, el Rey Serpiente, los héroes de los Tres Reinos y los estados beligerantes se enfrentan para tomar el control del nuevo universo al que fueron destinados cuando nace una nueva amenaza. Un terrible y gigantesco monstruo con forma de serpiente de ocho cabezas crea un clima sombrío por toda la tierra y derrota a la mayoría de los guerreros más valientes. Aquellos que sobrevivieron, ayudados por el misterioso Kaguya, deciden viajar atrás en el tiempo para salvar a los guerreros caídos y forjar nuevas alianzas, conseguir poderosas armas y formar un ejército con el que poder hacer frente y derrotar a la terrible hidra.

Years after the battle against Orochi, the Serpent King, the heroes of the Three Kingdoms and the Warring States struggle to seize control of the new universe they were thrown into when a new threat arises. A terrible and colossal monster, resembling a serpent with eight heads, casts its shadow across the land and defeats most of the brave warriors. The ones that survived, assisted by the mysterious Kaguya, travel back through time to save fallen warriors and forge new alliances, collect powerful weapons and build an army so they can have a chance to defeat the terrible Hydra.
